P005366.project_name: Office Cherifien des Phosphates Ben Idir Sur Daoui Sud Project

keywords.cdata: barter,bidding,comparative advantages,cost savings,Debt,domestic demand,Ecology,ECONOMIC JUSTIFICATION,Economic Rate of Return,economies of scale,effluents,employment,equilibrium,equilibrium prices,Expenditures,export markets,exports,externalities,finished products,fluorine,Forecasts,imports,Income,Insurance,interest rate,intermediate products,international trade,liquidity,market conditions,market prices,market risks,MARKETING,mines,pollution,price levels,pricing policy,producers,Purchasing,Sales,Sales Arrangements,spot prices,stocks,surplus,WORLD MARKETS

project_abstract.cdata: The Phosphate Fertilizer Project consists of: (a) the erection of a plant, near the port of Safi, to produce for export 371,250 tons per year of phosphoric acid and 225,780 tons per year of monoammonium phosphate; (b) facilities at the plant and at the port of Safi for the supply of utilities, the transportation and storage of raw materials and finished products.
